=== Dependents/Clients ===

* Unity

=== Test Plan ===

* Install latest (trusty-proposed) image on desktop
* Install freshly build MPs that are needed for landing
* On the desktop
** Ensure Shotwell photos are visible
*** Open Shotwell
*** Import a set of photos
*** Open the Dash and navigate to the Photos lens
*** Ensure the last 100 imported photos are visible in the Recent and/or My Photos category
** Preview a Shotwell photo
*** Click on a Shotwell photo
*** Ensure the preview contains a photo, a title and a date
** Preview a Shotwell photo that has been removed from disk (or on a missing drive)
*** Click the Shotwell photo
*** Ensure the preview contains a photo thumbnail, a title, a date and a missing photo text
*** Ensure the preview action opens Shotwell
** Ensure Facebook photos are visible
*** Add a Facebook online account
*** Open the Dash and navigate to the Photos lens
*** Ensure Facebook photos are visible in the Recent and/or My Photos category
** Ensure Facebook friends photos are visible
*** Add a Facebook online account
*** Open the Dash and navigate to the Photos lens
*** Ensure friends photos are visible in the Recent and/or Friends category
** Preview a Facebook photo
*** Click on a Facebook photo
*** Ensure a preview opens
*** Ensure it contains a photo, a title, a date and an album name
** Flickr photos
*** Same tests as Facebook
** Picasa photos
*** Same tests as Facebook, without the Friends category
** Disable an online account
*** Disable the search plugin integration for an online account
*** Ensure the Photos lens doesn't display photos from this account
** Disable online search
*** Disable the online search privacy setting
*** Ensure the Photos lens doesn't display photos from online sources
